org.openimaj.vis

Interface AnimatedVisualisationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioOverviewVisualisation, AudioSpectrogram, AudioWaveform, BarVisualisation, BarVisualisationBasic, DiversityAxis, DotPlotVisualisation, HeatMap, LabelledPointVisualisation, ShotBoundaryVideoBarVisualisation, Timeline, TimelineObjectAdapter, VideoBarVisualisation, VideoObjectVisualisation, VisualisationImpl, WorldMap, XYPlotVisualisation

    public interface AnimatedVisualisationListener
    An interface for objects that want to listen for animation events from an AnimatedVisualisationProvider. The object must implement the callback method that animated visualisations will call when they are ready to provide an update. It is not necessary that the provider actually produce the visualisation before calling this callback, simply that the animation is proceeding and should the listener wish they may call the VisualisationImageProvider.updateVis() method and then the VisualisationImageProvider.getVisualisationImage() method to retrieve the latest image.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void newVisualisationAvailable(AnimatedVisualisationProvider avp)
      Called by the AnimatedVisualisationProvider when a new visualisation is available to drawn (but hasn't been drawn yet).

        Called by the AnimatedVisualisationProvider when a new visualisation is available to drawn (but hasn't been drawn yet).
        Parameters:
        avp - The source of the event
